name: nativescript-nfc
description: NFC plugin for your NativeScript app

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: echo '!!!! run this on a device, a simulator will not work !!!!' && npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-nfc && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: echo '!!!! run this on a device, a simulator will not work !!!!' && npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
